features.name: Template List Display
features.description: Displays all page templates in a hierarchical list view with thumbnails, status indicators, and action buttons
test_scenarios: Verify child count displays for templates with children
Test empty state when no templates exist

features.name: Create New Template
features.description: Allows administrators to create new page templates with name, description, and layout selection
features.ui_location: Admin > Manage > Templates > Add Template button
test_scenarios: Create template with valid name and description
Validate empty template name shows error
Validate script injection prevention in template name
Create template when no existing templates
Verify new template appears in list after creation

features.name: Template Search
features.description: Search templates by name or localized name using keyword search
test_scenarios: Clear search to show all templates

features.name: Template Permissions Management
features.description: Configure role-based and user-specific permissions for templates including view and edit rights
features.ui_location: Admin > Manage > Templates > Create Template > Permissions
test_scenarios: Verify administrator role has default permissions
Remove all permissions and verify admin still has access

features.name: Template Thumbnail Generation
features.description: Automatically generates and updates thumbnail previews of template pages using html2canvas
test_scenarios: Verify medium and large thumbnail sizes

features.name: Delete Template
features.description: Delete templates from the system with confirmation dialog, except default templates
features.ui_location: Admin > Manage > Templates > Template Item > Delete button
test_scenarios: Verify default template cannot be deleted
Verify template with default skin cannot be deleted

features.name: Edit Template in Page Editor
features.description: Switch to edit mode to modify template content and layout in the page editor
features.ui_location: Admin > Manage > Templates > Template Item > Edit button
test_scenarios: Click edit to enter edit mode
Verify redirect to template page in edit mode
Update user personalization for edit mode
Handle edit for templates with special characters in URL

features.name: Template Drag and Drop
features.description: Reorder templates in hierarchy by dragging and dropping them to new positions
features.ui_location: Admin > Manage > Templates > Drag handle on template items

features.name: Default Template Management
features.description: Manage which template is set as the default template for new pages
test_scenarios: Identify default template by useDefaultSkin property
Default template auto-selected when creating new template

features.name: Template Workflow Integration
features.description: Applies content workflow settings to templates for approval processes
test_scenarios: Apply default workflow to new template

features.name: Template Page Settings
features.description: Configure template-specific settings like name, description, keywords, and URL

features.name: Template Status Display
features.description: Shows template status indicators like Hidden, Disabled, or Published
features.ui_location: Admin > Manage > Templates > Template list items
test_scenarios: Verify status CSS classes applied correctly
